channel.title: C4D Sig
channel.description:
I used alot of C4Ds in this and I accidentally erased with that default flower brush but i thought it came out quite well so I didn't get rid of it. Also don't hate me for using the orange/purple gradient map, I used other ones too! Promise!
[img]http://img144.imageshack.us/img144/3905/sigsigsigcc6.png[/img]
Rate/Hate/Yellow Fishing Bait!
I'm not going to update this peice of shit because TBH looking back at my old sigs I've hardly changed and what's the point in making new ones if i don't improve. I'm going to focus on design from now on because that's where i excel.

item.title: C4D Sig
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Out of the couple of posts that i read, it seems like everyone is following exe. If he gave it a 9/10, everyone else would say it was brilliant, and just rephrase the words exe would have used.

Many of the people who are new, who add a render to a background and add some shitty text get better than a 3/10.

I’d say this is sexy, and deserver’s more than you are rating.

I’m going to give 7/10, needs more erasing over the face.

Read full topic

@exe626 wrote:

I’ve seen people who get rated pro at NSL. You know how they do it? You make a shit load of boxes in photoshop that takes more than 200 layers and your instantly pro. Semi-pro is using a rainbow-ish style. Anything that involves a render is automatically GTFO, stock is Novice, Mod is sucking cock, inter is sucking ass.

item.title: C4D Sig
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:22, topic:154353”]Teh fuck? Have you look at my old signatures?

http://img112.imageshack.us/img112/8372/agentgoateems4.png
http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/505/goateesj9.png
http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/3450/disasterds1.png
http://img121.imageshack.us/img121/3429/firefoxsigkm9.png
http://img235.imageshack.us/img235/8482/goatkw9.png
http://img47.imageshack.us/img47/9264/goateeani2gu7.gif

It seems alot of people are idiots. Look at all of those signatures, they are all of the things i have posted on this website, they are all shit. Why the hell do people think i was/am good at doing this! I’ve just been here a long time but the quality has hardly changed. Look at all of those things and tell me they were better than the sig in the topic. I don’t think so.

Hopefully this will clear up the illusion that “I used to be good”.[/quote]
That’s not all of your sigs. The ones that you used to enter in SOTW are good. Those are the ones that I’m talking about, because those are the only ones that you have posted on here as far as I know.

Read full topic
